lead.title: A virtual gathering for the maintainers that make open source possible.

details.highlight: Talks for Open Source maintainers are often scattered across various conferences, or discussions between collaborators at project-specific summits.
details.body:
Join us in going beyond the 101 of being a maintainer, and dive into the tough (and rewarding) specifics. In a series of talks, maintainers will be talking directly about how their projects handle the many details of their daily work.

How do they survive the onslaught of notifications? These are the conversations we need to be having with each other.
